dove.util.struct.tree

Class Tree.InternalIDHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.InternalIDHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    private static class Tree.InternalIDHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    applys a ID, which is unique inside of this tree, to every node inside the tree the InternalIDHelper for a tree is always held by the treeroot if a subtree is newly added to a tree, all IDs have to be changed by the InternalIDHelper of the tree which holds the subtree if a subtree is removed from a tree, a new InternalIDHelper will be applied to this Tree and all IDs will be updated

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Stack<java.lang.Integer> freedIDStack
      holds all IDs of nodes which have been removed from this tree, and can therefore be reused these IDs will always be used first, before creating a new ID
      private int internalIDHelperID
      the ID of this InternalIDHelperID the pair: id + internalIDHelper.internalIDHelperID is unique for every node
      private int nextID
      holds the next free ID, which can be applied to a new node if freedIDStack holds any freed IDs from subtrees, which have been removed, these IDs will be used first
      private static int nextInternalIDHelperID
      the next InternalIDHelperID that can be given to an InternalIDHelper
      private static int NO_ID_SET 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private InternalIDHelper()
      creates an new InternalIDHelper and gives it a new ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void excludeTree(Tree tree)
      called if a subtree is removed saves all ID which were held by nodes of this subtree in the freedIDStack for later use
      private void giveID(Tree tree)
      gives a free ID to tree
      private void includeTree(Tree tree)
      called if a new subtree is added applys a new ID to ever node of the newly added subtree
      private void removeID(Tree tree)
      frees the ID held by this tree

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
